title: Acholi (1985) Genesis Portion
title_vernacular: Buk Mukwoŋo Pa Moses Ma Gilwoŋo Acakki
description: This fragment of the Book of Genesis, chapters 1 through 4, tells how God created the world. It is in the Acholi language which is spoken in Uganda and was published by Wycliffe Bible Translators in 2009.

language.name: Acoli
language.area: North, Kitgum District; Adjumani and Pader districts. Also in Sudan.
